fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Economy, finance and the euro, Agriculture, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Trade, Consumers, International co-operation and development, Education and training, Energy, Environment, Youth, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, External Relations, Trans-European Networks, Public Health, Sport, Transport, Climate Action, Borders and Security
industry_forums: Participation in Textile Industry Forums, Industry 4.0 Forums, Manutex, Manufuture, DG-GROW, etc.
eu_initiatives: ITA is involved in promoting several EU initiatives in the Textile sector. Some of these initiatives include Manutex, Manufuture, Manutex 4.0, etc.
section: IV - Think tanks, research and academic institutions
membership:
Member associations and networks that ITA currently works with can be found at this website: 
http://www.ita.rwth-aachen.de/cms/ITA/Die-Organisationseinheit/~lfqi/Netzwerk/lidx/1/
position: Head - Aerospace Program, Head - EU Affairs
relevant_communication:
ITA has participated in over 30 EU Projects over the last decade. Some of these projects include: GreenBraid, Bio4Self, DeMaCo, GreenBraid, AllOxITD, BioSys, 3G-SCAFF, ITOOL, INSU-SHELL ( LIFE 06), ProFiTex, 
Multiweave, etc. ITA has published over 1000 publications resulting from EU and other similar programs.
goals__remit: The ITA Group is an international research and training service provider for fiber-based high-performance materials, textile semi-finished products and their manufacturing processes with 350 employees.The core of the ITA Group is the research and teaching institution, Institute of Textile Technology, at RWTH Aachen University.
